transcript:
Everyone gotupand began watch- ing the movements of our troops below, as plainly visible as if but a stone's throw away, and the movements of the approaching enemy farther off. At the same instant the sun came fully out from behind the clouds, and the clear sound of the solitary shot and the brilliance of the bright sunshine merged in a single joyous and spirited impression. 
Two OF the enemy's shots had already flown across the bridge, where there was a crush. Half- way across stood Prince Nes
